summary: Comprehensive testing of Progress Tracking App completed successfully. All backend APIs working (13/13 tests passed). Frontend fully functional with excellent user experience. XP system, level progression, badge system, and analytics all working correctly. Neo-brutalist design implemented beautifully.
passed_tests: All 13 backend API endpoints working (100% success rate)
Dashboard displays user stats correctly (Level 5, XP: 350/500, Streak: 1 day, Activities: 3)
Level progress bar shows correctly with XP tracking
Activities page allows logging new activities with category, date, duration, notes
XP system working: 10 XP per minute (45 min activity = 450 XP gained)
Level up system working: 100 XP per level (user leveled up from 4 to 5)
Streak tracking functional: shows 1 day current streak
Badge system working: First Step badge earned, 2 of 6 badges total
Activity list displays all logged activities with delete functionality
Analytics page shows daily/weekly/monthly charts correctly
Category breakdown pie chart displays (though limited data)
Settings page allows creating custom categories with colors
Default categories pre-loaded (Study, Gaming, Gym, Sleep)
Recent activities widget on dashboard working
All navigation links work correctly
Neo-brutalist design with thick borders, vibrant colors, shadow effects
Responsive design working well
Real-time stat updates after activity logging
Success notifications working (activity logged, category created)
Form validation working properly
